name: Saho Saho
description:
DESCRIPTION  

Saho Saho is a little Fox who have lost her children. She will search & find them through differents levels by doing puzzles.

This videogame is a protoype made in a game jam. 

DETAILS

Game plateform : PC        

Genre : Puzzle Game

Language : English

CREDITS  

Thibault Leblan : Game Designer - Level Designer - Level Builder - Gameplay Programmer - Lighting Artist

Carla Deveze : Character Artist - Environment Artist - Level Builder

Samia El-Yacoubi :  Character Artist - Environment Artist
